proposal: Diving into London's charm through "Across the Pond – Part IV: So Long, and Thanks for All the Fish," I see you've captured the essence of adventure and discovery. Congrats on being the sole explorer in the ETH network! Imagine enhancing this journey with our B2B tools, allowing your community to deploy their own DEX or even a lottery, sharing the revenue as they explore. Let's bridge the gap between adventure and blockchain, shall we?
